mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.cmUsrUiConf.updateCmUsrUiConf */ WITH UPSERT AS ( SELECT #{confVl}::text AS CONF_VL, #{usrId}::text AS USR_ID, #{confCd }::text AS CONF_CD ), UPDATE_OPTION AS ( UPDATE CM_USR_UI_CONF CUUC SET CONF_VL = UPSERT.CONF_VL FROM UPSERT WHERE CUUC.USR_ID=UPSERT.USR_ID AND CUUC.CONF_CD=UPSERT.CONF_CD ) INSERT INTO CM_USR_UI_CONF ( CONF_CD, USR_ID, CONF_VL ) SELECT UPSERT.CONF_CD, UPSERT.USR_ID, UPSERT.CONF_VL FROM UPSERT WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CM_USR_UI_CONF CUUC WHERE CUUC.USR_ID=UPSERT.USR_ID AND CUUC.CONF_CD=UPSERT.CONF_CD )
